attributes.action: Put Gary Coleman up his nose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just don't know if this would be possible, but I'd like to see him put the effort in. To be honest, I think if he started out with a few fingers and that he'd probably manage it. I mean, Arnie got that tracking device out of his nose in Total Recall and he didn't even have much practive for that. You gotta think Blair's better than Arnie, right?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
